caption.p: Effect of Thymus serrulatus Hochst. ex Benth. oil (TSA oil) on kidney function markers ( A) urea, ( B) blood urea nitrogen (BUN), ( C) uric acid, and ( D) creatinine in serum against Cd-induced renal injury in rats. *** p < 0.001, shows the comparison of toxic control with untreated (normal control) group (unpaired t-test); ## p < 0.01 and ### p < 0.001, show the comparison of a treated group with toxic control (one-way ANOVA followed by Tukey test). Each bar represents mean Â± SEM ( n = 6).
